formElement.label: YAML content:
formElement.documentation: Content of the YAML specification from where objects to be parsed in order to create or update them.

formElement.label: Cluster Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the cluster in ElectricFlow that encapsulates the Kubernetes cluster on which the service is to be deployed.

formElement.label: Cluster Or Environment Project Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the project that the cluster belongs to if it is a top-level project cluster. Or the name of the project that the environment belongs to if it is an environment-scoped cluster.

formElement.label: Environment Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the environment that the cluster belongs to. Not applicable for a top-level project cluster.
